name: Pagination.Root
description: A navigation component that allows users to browse through pages.
description_zh: A navigation component that allows users to browse through pages.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

defaultPage.description:
The initial page of the pagination when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control the state of the pagination.
defaultPage.description_zh:
首次呈现分页时的初始页。
当您不需要控制分页的状态时使用。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  ellipsis(index: number): string
  prevTrigger: string
  nextTrigger: string
  item(page: number): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the accordion. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 折叠面板中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

pageSize.description: Number of data items per page

siblingCount.description: Number of pages to show beside active page
siblingCount.description_zh: 在活动页面旁边显示的页数

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states
translations.description_zh: 指定标识辅助功能元素及其状态的本地化字符串

type.description: The type of the trigger element

events.name: pageChange
events.description: Called when the page number is changed

events.name: pageSizeChange
events.description: Called when the page size is changed
